Posts.Content: Well surgery is over. Went great. Not so impressed with the nursing staff I personally dealt with. Having a medical background. I was so shocked. But poor pain control. I am much more painful than I thought. I have 3 drains, which I hate. They will hopefully be out tomorrow. But they have caused me much discomfort. I'm blessed to have the help I have. Pathology was, the cancer was bigger and more aggressive than expected. But margins are clear. So hopefully with chemo and radiation. I will recover.  Advise,  have a comfy spot, lots of pillows. Get your rest. But yet move around as tolerated.
Posts.Title: 4 days post bilateral mastectomy

Posts.Content: I am 3 weeks dignosed with a duct mass spread to my axillary nodes. Im having a bilateral mastectomy with axillary node removal in 4 days. I am wondering if anyone else's breast hurt? Mine burns,and aches. And under my armpit. Or is it in my head?
Posts.Title: Breast pain before surgery

Posts.Content: Didnt think of it until now but i though i was developing a resistance to my deoderant for the last 6months. But i have a different smell too.
Posts.Title: Cancer smell
